original_text: as we look not to the things that are seen but to the things that are unseen. For the things that are seen are transient, but the things that are unseen are eternal.
korean_text: 우리가 주목하는 것은 보이는 것이 아니요 보이지 않는 것이니 보이는 것은 잠깐이요 보이지 않는 것은 영원함이라

sentences.original_text: as we look not to the things that are seen
but to the things that are unseen
For the things that are seen are transient
but the things that are unseen are eternal
